wikipedia_page.main: Robert Crawford was a Scottish professional footballer. A left half, he played in the Football League for Preston North End, Blackpool and Blackburn Rovers.

response: * Bobby Crawford (ice hockey) (born 1960), American ice hockey player
*Bobby Crawford (ice hockey) (born 1960), American ice hockey player
Footballer Bobby Crawford, who played almost 400 Football League games for Preston North End, was born in Glespin in 1901.
